titles.title: A resolution congratulating Western Washington University for winning the 2012 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division II Men's Basketball Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/17/2012--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates Western Washington University for winning the 2012 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division II Men's Basketball Championship.
